body: Nice. This artist draws well, and I like the focus on slowly building domination and humiliation. To everyone bitching: this is hentai, it isn't supposed to be a model of a healthy relationship, it's just supposed to get your rocks off.
Imagine still having a moral compass after years of reading hentai lol

You guys are taking this way too seriously. This is hentai, it's all over the top and dramatic for the sake of the fetish, in this context they are both consensual, no one is this stupid or crazy irl, he knew from the start what he was going to get, he wasn't brainwashed. A normal real person, no matter how stupid or ignorant or virgin, would have backed away at a certain point.
You people remind me reading hentai when I was younger.
This without the text is pretty good

Yep, @THEgamer90 hit it right on the head. This woman is awful, feigning love and victimization like this is truly bad, perhaps even worse than NTR. At least NTR can be healed from, this shit cannot. What's so wrong with genuine love in kink anyway?

Even if this is a hentai, this is a good example of how first exposures to sexual activities can severely fuck up a persons life and their ability to make healthy relationships.  Stuff like this happens to varying degrees in real life, and I'm sure that the victims like the male in this doujin will expect every other relationship he has to be the same.  I don't know wtf im saying in a nhentai comment section but I guess be aware on your influence on other people lol and understand that the human brain is extremely volatile at a young age and in this ambiguous process of "becoming an adult" peoples exposure to what human relationships look, feel, act, etc. like will remain with them for the rest of their lives.  Long story short child rape is bad
